snippet: As anger over United States surveillance continues, German officials said they would explore having Edward J. Snowden testify to a parliamentary inquiry.
abstract: German government will examine how former National Security Agency contractor Edward J Snowden could testify to a parliamentary inquiry into American intelligence activities in Germany, amid rising demands not only to thank Snowden for his disclosures but also to grant him full political asylum.
lead_paragraph: As anger over United States surveillance continues, German officials said they would explore having Edward J. Snowden testify to a parliamentary inquiry.

headline.main: Germany Considers Having Snowden Testify to Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Germany Considers Having Snowden Testify to Inquiry
